text: Óscar Cabedo Cardá (born 12 November 1994 in Onda) is a Spanish cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . He is the brother of the cyclist Víctor Cabedo who died in 2012. In August 2018, he was named in the startlist for the 2018 Vuelta a España. ==Career achievements== ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2018 ! scope="col" | 2019 ! scope="col" | 2020 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |— |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |86 |116 |IP |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Burgos Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
